faction.name: New Rygolic Host
faction.description: The New Rygolic Host (N.R.H.) operates autonomously: a stateless, headless army safeguarding the Petty States as a whole from foreign invasion. All N.R.H. troops are connected to 'Rygonet', an advanced command system distributing its computations across its soldiers' brains, relying on superhuman coordination and highly advanced weapons to offset its numeric disadvantage with precision firepower.

specialRules.name: Active Camouflage
specialRules.description: Rygolic stealth units are fitted with advanced camouflage systems capable of variously concealing them on the visible, IR and EM spectrums. This unit cannot be spotted from more than 6" away regardless of terrain.

specialRules.name: Drone
specialRules.description: Rygo light support units are often fully autonomous, as unshakable as they are inflexible. This unit's quality is marked Q*, indicating that it is unaffected by pin.

specialRules.name: Guided Shell
specialRules.description: Rygolic ordnance is precision-guided and designed to minimize collateral while maximizing damage. This weapon gains an Ignore Cover (X) value where X equals the number of friendly units currently spotting the unit.

specialRules.name: Hovercraft
specialRules.description: Tracked IFVs have been supplanted by air-cushioned craft in N.R.H. service: the best of all worlds. This vehicle is marked Vec (H). It never pays movement to enter or exit terrain and ignores swamp's terrain multiplier.

specialRules.name: Laser
specialRules.description: Federal R&D has yet to fully understand Rygo directed energy weapons. This weapon always rolls a minimum of 6+ to kill regardless of the target's Toughness.

specialRules.name: Round Extruder
specialRules.description: Advanced Rygolic vehicles can carry hundreds of large-bore rounds: stockpiling kinetic penetrators or collapsible warheads and propellant sleeves. This weapon can use a fire action to reload one Ammo for itself instead of shooting in the Fire Phase.

specialRules.name: Rygonet (X")
specialRules.description: Rygonet is a distributed intelligence: using a sliver of each construct's brainpower to delegate orders. Any friendly Rygolic unit within X" of this unit is eligible to lend its action to any other Rygo unit in that same radius.

specialRules.name: Strider
specialRules.description: Biological legs grant Rygolic light armor all-terrain mobility and the ability to crouch behind cover. This vehicle is marked Vec (S) and considered infantry for movement purposes.

units.name: NODE TEAM
units.unitAbility: One Node Team comes free per 100 points as a standard TACOM. Further Node Teams may be purchased for 20 points each at no limit.

units.name: NODE TEAM (ADDITIONAL)
units.unitAbility: One Node Team comes free per 100 points as a standard TACOM. Further Node Teams may be purchased for 20 points each at no limit.

units.name: G1 GANGLION
units.unitAbility: This unit may not lend actions to friendly units via Rygonet.

units.name: S3 STOMA
units.unitAbility: When this unit activates in the Fire Phase, it may select one friendly Rygolic unit within Line of Sight up to 8" away which has not already acted that round. The Stoma and the selected unit fire at the same target simultaneously. Units activated this way are treated as having already fired for the round.

units.name: CHEMICAL TEAM
units.unitAbility: May always lose up to 3 pin during Upkeep, even when inside of Chemical Weapons.

units.name: CAPSULE SQUAD
units.unitAbility: Deploy this unit via a Capsule Insertion support mission during the Support Phase.

units.name: SIMULACRUM
units.unitAbility: When entering Close Combat this unit may opt to copy any enemy unit that it would enter close combat with. If two or more Simulacrum units would enter Close Quarter with each other immediately kill them.

units.name: AUTOMATED SENTRY
units.unitAbility: This unit cannot fire during the first Fire Phase of the game if Paradropped

units.name: AUTOMATED ATGM
units.unitAbility: This unit cannot fire during the first Fire Phase of the game if Paradropped

shotTypes.name: Dispersed Array
specialRules: All units (including airborne untis) in the radius take maximum Pin

weapons.name: Shockwave Dispersal System
specialRules: Infantry in radius take one pin
Smoke radii with their centers in this radius are cleared

units.name: R1 REDSTONE
units.unitAbility: If this unit falls back from close combat, choose one engaged enemy unit to take a Strength 1+ hit on it's rear arc.

units.name: R2 REPEATER
units.unitAbility: If this unit falls back from close combat, choose one engaged enemy unit to take a Strength 1+ hit on it's rear arc.

units.name: DESTROYING ANGEL
units.unitAbility: Every time this unit uses APS, its weapon Dice statistic decreases by 1 for the rest of the round. If the Dice value hits 0 it cannot be fired this round and APS cannot be triggered again this round. During Upkeep the laser weapon's Dice value is reset to 4 regardless of how many munitions were intercepted last round.
